document_title: Kidney cancer: Causes, signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Kidney cancer is divided into many different stages. If the tumor is limited to the kidney and has not spread, it is called localized kidney cancer. In advanced localized kidney cancer, the tumor has grown out of the kidney into surrounding tissue and invaded the veins, adrenal glands, or lymph nodes. Metastatic disease if the cancer has spread to distant lymph nodes or other organs.
subsection_title: ung thu than.json. Stages of kidney cancer
subsection_data:
ung thu than.json. Stages of kidney cancer
Kidney cancer is divided into many different stages. If the tumor is limited to the kidney and has not spread, it is called localized kidney cancer. In advanced localized kidney cancer, the tumor has grown out of the kidney into surrounding tissue and invaded the veins, adrenal glands, or lymph nodes. Metastatic disease if the cancer has spread to distant lymph nodes or other organs.
